Remove Credit
Card Balances
The Payoff Loan

The Payoff Loan™ allows you to step away from your credit card balances and focus on what's most important to you. Free yourself of $5000 to $25,000 in credit card balances and take steps toward a happy, successful future.

Our Difference

Through a combination of understanding who people are and what motivates them with our unwavering desire to see customers succeed, we are committed to the mission of restoring humanity to financial services.

Discover Your Financial Personality

By taking the Payoff Financial Personality Quiz, you can pinpoint the secrets behind how you spend, save and mnage your money.

Take the Quiz

The Free Spirit

You focus on getting things done quickly, rather than getting them done perfectly. You buck routine, always getting restless if you're doing the same thing day in and day out.

See All Personalities
 
 
 
 
 

Payoff Mission

Payoff is a next generation financial services company, designing products that help people pay off their credit cards faster and save money.

Watch the video

Payoff Team

Though our talents may be diverse, we are all aligned with the mission to restor humanity to financial services.

Payoff Community

We're all about community and connecting the world for the better. Join us in our mission to bring a refreshingly human approach to finance.

  • Legal

  • Terms of Use
  • Privacy Policy
  • Security

Payoff works with a bank partner to ultimately originate loans. First Electronic Bank issues all loans made using the Payoff Platform. First Electronic Bank is an FDIC insured Utah-chartered industrial bank located in Salt Lake City, Utah, Member FDIC and Equal Housing Lender. Individual borrowers must be a US citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and social security number are required. All loans are subject to credit review and approval. Your actual rate depends upon credit score, loan amount, loan term, credit usage and history. You must be a US citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Currently loans are not offered in: AL, AZ, CO, CT, DE, IL, IN, IA, KS, LA, ME, MA, MN, NH, NJ, NY, PA, SD, VT, TX, WI, and WY. Our mailing address is: Payoff, Inc., 3200 Park Center Drive, STE 800, Costa Mesa, CA 92626.
